name: Pepol
body:
### Welcome to Pepol.
This is a small perl program that downloads all your podcast.

## Discription
This Program downloads Podcast and has a YAML-Config file
You also have a Tk-based Config Program.
Podcasts download are save in a sqlite-file

## Config
set your personal options in pepol.conf
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
